bibl.title: An Egyptian Text in Greek Characters. Some Notes.
bibl.note: Concerne le papyrus magique P. Oxy. Inv. 21/3 B/ 29 F (Oxyrhynchus, vers 150 p.C.) publié par: W.E. Crum, An Egyptian Text in Greek Characters, JEA 28 (1942) pp. 20-31 et pll. II-III.
bibl.seg: Volten Aksel, An Egyptian Text in Greek Characters. Some Notes.
Studia Orientalia Ioanni Pedersen dicata (Copenhague, 1953) pp. 364-376.
